job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Research Engineer, with passion for working on cutting edge problems that can help us create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video.

   Our aim is to make video content creation available for all - not only to studio production!

        You will be someone who loves to code and build working systems. You are used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment. You will have experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release. You will also have extensive knowledge and experience in Computer Vision and Generative AI domain.

       You will join a group of more than 40 Engineers in the R&D department and will have the opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams across diverse areas, our R&D research is guided by our co-founders - Prof. Lourdes Agapito and Prof. Matthias Niessner.

   If you know and love DALL.E, MUSE, IMAGEN, MAKE-A-VIDEO, STABLE DIFFUSION and more - and you love large data and large compute, then we would love to talk to you.

What will you be doing?

     In this position, you'll join the team to help develop our foundational model for video generation based on large video data-sets. You will also help build the academic contributions in this area. In this role you will be conducting cutting edge research, pushing the boundaries and going beyond existing SOTA solutions. This would include:
     * Reviewing specialised literature on text to video / video synthesis.
     * Designing the requirements, project scoping and owning the roadmap in your area.
     * Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project and making sure that it is in line with our vision.
     * Building libraries to accelerate our iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
     * Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
     * Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
     * Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
     * Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions., You will work in a hybrid setting with an office in Amsterdam
job_details.full_text:
Research Engineer - Video Diffusion

We are looking for a Research Engineer, with passion for working on cutting edge problems that can help us create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video.

   Our aim is to make video content creation available for all - not only to studio production!

        You will be someone who loves to code and build working systems. You are used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment. You will have experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release. You will also have extensive knowledge and experience in Computer Vision and Generative AI domain.

       You will join a group of more than 40 Engineers in the R&D department and will have the opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams across diverse areas, our R&D research is guided by our co-founders - Prof. Lourdes Agapito and Prof. Matthias Niessner.

   If you know and love DALL.E, MUSE, IMAGEN, MAKE-A-VIDEO, STABLE DIFFUSION and more - and you love large data and large compute, then we would love to talk to you.

What will you be doing?

     In this position, you'll join the team to help develop our foundational model for video generation based on large video data-sets. You will also help build the academic contributions in this area. In this role you will be conducting cutting edge research, pushing the boundaries and going beyond existing SOTA solutions. This would include:
     * Reviewing specialised literature on text to video / video synthesis.
     * Designing the requirements, project scoping and owning the roadmap in your area.
     * Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project and making sure that it is in line with our vision.
     * Building libraries to accelerate our iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
     * Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
     * Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
     * Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
     * Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions., You will work in a hybrid setting with an office in Amsterdam

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing foundational models for video generation using text-to-video techniques, fine-tuning LLMs, building RAG systems, and creating production-grade user-facing software. The mention of specific generative models like DALL.E, MUSE, IMAGEN, MAKE-A-VIDEO, and STABLE DIFFUSION, along with frameworks and the focus on 'full stack' development for direct product impact, strongly aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile. While there's a mention of ML lifecycle and research, the core focus is on generative AI applications and building systems around them.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing foundational models for video generation based on large video data-sets, conducting cutting edge research, pushing boundaries and going beyond existing SOTA solutions, adapting off-the-shelf solutions for product purposes, and optimizing prototypes into working solutions. This directly relates to creating and adapting generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop our foundational model for video generation based on large video data-sets

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Reviewing specialised literature on text to video / video synthesis' indicates a need to understand and build upon existing research in generative AI for video.
job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing specialised literature on text to video / video synthesis

job_tasks.justification: Designing requirements, project scoping, and owning the roadmap indicates a strategic understanding of the project's goals and direction.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing the requirements, project scoping and owning the roadmap in your area

job_tasks.justification: Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project and ensuring it aligns with the company's vision demonstrates business understanding and project oversight.
job_tasks.phrase: Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project and making sure that it is in line with our vision

job_tasks.justification: Building libraries to accelerate iteration speed, abstracting common functionality, automating tests, and visualizing results are core software development activities that support the ML/GenAI workflow.
job_tasks.phrase: Building libraries to accelerate our iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.)

job_tasks.justification: Developing production quality software and working 'full stack' with the ability to deliver direct to product signifies traditional software development for user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world

job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment is a comprehensive description of MLOps responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment

job_tasks.justification: Optimizing for deployment and turning prototypes into working solutions involves adapting and refining models for practical use, which falls under modeling and its practical application.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.

loves to code and build working systems
used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment
experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release
Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle
collaborate with multiple research teams across diverse areas
owning the roadmap in your area
